alert.note: Alert for Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 15 at 6:32AM CDT until September 15 at 12:38PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of the Panhandle of Oklahoma, including the following county, Beaver. Portions of the Panhandle of Texas, including the following counties, Lipscomb and Ochiltree. * WHEN...Until 845 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 632 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Booker, Follett, Darrouzett and Slapout. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
